transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji, hello. Shri Rang ji, good afternoon.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Ji, ji sir, main Preeti baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se. Meri baat hui thi na subah aap bol rahe the ki main 12 baje call karna. To main discuss kar lunga.
Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Haan Preeti ji bataiye.
Customer: Hello, voice aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Haan, haan aa rahi hai bataiye.
Executive: Aapki voice nahi aa rahi. Main keh rahi thi ki main keh rahi hu aapki subah baat hui thi na meri.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan, ki aapko jo hai ki visit wala abhi opportunity nahi hai sir. Wo abhi nahi hai aa sakte hain. Matlab ye cheez abhi possible nahi hai. Ab band ho chuka hai actually mein visit. To jo bhi cheeze hain hum online guide karenge saari cheeze hain. To maine subah se aapke relate aap se baat ki thi to aapne bola tha 12 baje call kar lena main ek bari discuss kar lunga ji se aur Rahul ji ka bhi mere us din call aaya tha maine bata diya tha ki possibility nahi hai sir. Hamari side se possible hota hum zarur aapko aap logo ko provide karte. To ye cheez ke liye baat ho gayi hai ji se.
Customer: Haan, to lekin to hume kaise pata chalega? Hamara bahut sara queries hai.
Executive: Haan bataiye sir, sir aap puchiye na sir. Hum hi solve karenge. Hum hi accounts dekhte hain aapka.
Customer: Hmm. Nahi par mujhe pata hai lekin aap hume abhi propose kya kar rahe the?
Executive: MDC propose?
Customer: Haan, main hum aapko bata rahe the ki MDC one year ka bhi hai hamare pass. MDC three years ka bhi hai. Isse isse better hamare pass services hai sir jo TrustSeal ki. Mujhe bataiye hamare competitors kya use kar rahe hain aur uska kitna ye hai?
Executive: Main bata deti hu. Ji main bata deti hu.
Customer: Mujhe properly dekhna hai aap mujhe dikhaiye.
Executive: Dekhna hai? Main link share karu aap aa jaiye. Join kariye.
Customer: Haan, link share kijiye.
Executive: Main link share karti hu. Haan rukiye 12:10.
Aapka mail ID jo yaha pe registered hai sir usi pe share karti hu main.
Customer: Kya na kya mail ID registered hai kaunsa?
Executive: Ah, main bata deti hu aapko. Aap ek minute line pe rahiye.
Customer: Mujhe lead nahi mil raha hai. Achha lead nahi mil raha hai sab.
Executive: Haan, main tabhi sir dekhiye hum log ek bari guidance de dete hain aapko. Aap ek minute line pe rahiye.

Customer: Aap mujhe bhej dijiye link main join kar raha hu.
Executive: Mil gaya hai sir link?
Customer: Haan bhej dijiye main join kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan link bhej dijiye mail ID pe bhej dijiye sir aapko mail ID pe. Kaunsa mail ID pe bhej?
Customer: Ah, rukiye sir main bata deti hu aapko kaunsa mail ID hai. Ye hai connect@pavingplus.com.
Customer: Thik hai, main join kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan join kar lijiye sir regardingly ek bari.
Customer: Haan, thik hai.
Customer: Sir mujhe demo dijiye na.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting good leads.

- Wants to know what competitors are using.

- Wants a demo.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide the customer.

- Executive shared a link to join and see.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, mdc, trustseal, demo
